info.name: Classic Youtube Dark [for old design only!]
info.description: A fork of Youtube Dark Grey NOTE: Not work in the modern design, only classic/old. You need some of these extensions for example: Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/es/firefox/addon/youtube-classic/ Chromium: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/youtube-classic-restore-y/aooobjmnokciopfgejdlbnklafighoaj
